sen.j: 三傑（さんけつ）とは、歴史上のある事柄や、同じ主君に仕えた家臣などのうち、特に功績が大きかった者を3人選んでいうこと。
sen.e: Sanketsu means three outstanding people chosen out of those who made the greatest achievements in historical incidents or in their services to their lords.
Sanketsu means three outstanding people chosen out of those who made the greatest achievements in historical incidents or in their services to their lords.
Sanketsu means three outstanding people chosen out of those who made the greatest achievements in historical incidents or in their services to their lords.
Sengoku Sanketsu (Three Outstanding People in Sengoku)
Sengoku Sanketsu (Three Outstanding People in Warlike Period)
sen.cmt: Sengokuの意味がわかる語に訂正しました。
sen.e: Sengoku Sanketsu (Three Outstanding People in Warlike Period)

sen.j: - 戦国時代 (日本)を終結させた現在の愛知県出身の3人の武将、織田信長・豊臣秀吉・徳川家康を指す。
sen.e: refers to Nobunaga ODA, Hideyoshi TOYOTOMI, and Ieyasu TOKUGAWA, the three busho (Japanese military commander) from present-day Aichi Prefecture, who brought the Sengoku period to an end.
refers to Nobunaga ODA, Hideyoshi TOYOTOMI, and Ieyasu TOKUGAWA, the three busho (Japanese military commander) from present-day Aichi Prefecture, who brought the Sengoku period to an end.
refers to Nobunaga ODA, Hideyoshi TOYOTOMI, and Ieyasu TOKUGAWA, the three busho (Japanese military commander) from present-day Aichi Prefecture, who brought the Sengoku period to an end.
Tokugawa- Shitenno (Four Generals Serving Tokugawa Ieyasu)
Tokugawa- Shitenno (Four Generals Serving Tokugawa Ieyasu)
Tokugawa- Shitenno (Four Generals Serving Tokugawa Ieyasu)

sen.j: 徳川家康の功臣のうち,特に武勇に秀でた3人,本多忠勝・榊原康政・井伊直政を指す。
sen.e: refers to Tadakatsu HONDA, Yasumasa SAKAKIBARA, and Naomasa II, the three biggest heroes of the meriroious retainers of Ieyasu TOKUGAWA.
refers to Tadakatsu HONDA, Yasumasa SAKAKIBARA, and Naomasa II, the three meritorious retainers of Ieyasu TOKUGAWA who had outstanding military prowess.
sen.cmt: meriroiousをmeritoriousに修正しました。「武勇に秀でた」の訳も修正しました。
sen.e: refers to Tadakatsu HONDA, Yasumasa SAKAKIBARA, and Naomasa II, the three meritorious retainers of Ieyasu TOKUGAWA who had outstanding military prowess.
Sanketsu (Three Outstanding People) of DATE
Sanketsu (Three Outstanding People) of DATE
Sanketsu (Three Outstanding People) of DATE

sen.j: 伊達政宗の功臣のうち,特に功績の大きかった3人,片倉景綱・伊達成実・茂庭綱元を指す。
sen.e: refers to Kagetsuna KATAKURA, Shigezane DATE, and Tsunamoto MONIWA, the three men of the meritorious retainers of Masamune DATE who made the greatest achievements.
refers to Kagetsuna KATAKURA, Shigezane DATE, and Tsunamoto MONIWA, the three men of the meritorious retainers of Masamune DATE who made the greatest achievements.
refers to Kagetsuna KATAKURA, Shigezane DATE, and Tsunamoto MONIWA, the three men of the meritorious retainers of Masamune DATE who made the greatest achievements.

sen.j: 土井利勝寛永の三傑、三弼、三輪
sen.e: Toshikatsu DOI, Sanketsu, Sanpitsu, and Sanrin of Kanei
Sanketsu in Kanei era
sen.cmt: ウェブ表記では「寛永の三傑」でしたのでそれに対応した訳にしました
sen.e: Sanketsu in Kanei era

sen.j: - '徳川家光に仕えた土井利勝・青山忠俊・酒井忠世を指す。'
sen.e: refers to Toshikatsu DOI, Tadatoshi AOYAMA, and Tadayo SAKAI, who served Iemitsu TOKUGAWA.
refers to Toshikatsu DOI, Tadatoshi AOYAMA, and Tadayo SAKAI, who served Iemitsu TOKUGAWA.
refers to Toshikatsu DOI, Tadatoshi AOYAMA, and Tadayo SAKAI, who served Iemitsu TOKUGAWA.
Ishin (the Restoration) Sanketsu
Ishin (the Restoration) Sanketsu
Ishin (the Restoration) Sanketsu

sen.j: - 倒幕・明治維新に尽力した藩士・諸士のうち、特に功績の大きかった3人、木戸孝允・西郷隆盛・大久保利通を指す。
sen.e: referst to Takayoshi KIDO, Takamori SAIGO, and Toshimichi OKUBO, the three men who made the greatest achievements of the feudal retainers of domain and shoshi who made contributions to the overthrowing of the Shogunate and the Meiji Restoration.

referst to Takayoshi KIDO, Takamori SAIGO, and Toshimichi OKUBO, the three men who made the greatest achievements of the feudal retainers of domain and shoshi who made contributions to the overthrowing of the Shogunate and the Meiji Restoration.

referst to Takayoshi KIDO, Takamori SAIGO, and Toshimichi OKUBO, the three men who made the greatest achievements of the feudal retainers of domain and shoshi who made contributions to the overthrowing of the Shogunate and the Meiji Restoration.
Sanketsu of Han
Sanketsu of Han
Sanketsu of Han

sen.j: 前漢の高祖 劉邦に仕えた功臣のうち、特に功績の大きかった3人、蕭何・張良・韓信を指す。
sen.e: refers to Xiao He, Choryo, and Han Xin, the three who made the greatest achievements of the meritorious retainers who served Koso of the Former Han Dynasty, Liu Bang.
refers to Xiao He, Zhang Liang, and Han Xin, the three who made the greatest achievements of the meritorious retainers who served Gaozu (first emperor) of the Former Han Dynasty, Liu Bang.
sen.cmt: 張良と高祖だけローマ字読みなので中国語の英語表記にしました。
sen.e: refers to Xiao He, Zhang Liang, and Han Xin, the three who made the greatest achievements of the meritorious retainers who served Gaozu (first emperor) of the Former Han Dynasty, Liu Bang.
Sanketsu of Shu
Sanketsu of Shu
Sanketsu of Shu

sen.j: 三国志における蜀の皇帝 劉備に仕えた忠臣のうち、特にその功績が大きかった3人、諸葛亮・関羽・張飛を指す。
sen.e: refers to Zhuge Liang, Guan Yu, and Cho Hi, the three men who made the greatest achievements of the loyal subjects who served Liu Bei, Emperor of Shu of Sangokushi (The Chronicle of the Three Kingdoms).

refers to Zhuge Liang, Guan Yu, and Zhang Fei, the three men who made the greatest achievements of the loyal subjects who served Liu Bei, Emperor of Shu of Sangokushi (The Chronicle of the Three Kingdoms).
sen.cmt: 張飛だけローマ字読みなので中国語の英語表記にしました。
sen.e: refers to Zhuge Liang, Guan Yu, and Zhang Fei, the three men who made the greatest achievements of the loyal subjects who served Liu Bei, Emperor of Shu of Sangokushi (The Chronicle of the Three Kingdoms).
